subject: RE: 152810- HF 4 Vs. CGML
content: Information Classification: ll Limited Access Hi all,   Please advise as we see a collateral discrepancy. I have provide moves to before on several occasions. Can I have a confirmation that you are investigating the issue. We have been disputing for quite a while and I have brought this to your attention a few times.     Kind Regards / Mit freundlichen Grüßen _______________________________________________________________   xxxxxx xxxxxxx, xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx    xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx   XXXXXX XXXXX XXXXXXX | D - 11111 XXXXXXXX XX XXXX 11 P +11 (1) 11-11111-11111  (recorded line) | F +11 (1) 11-11111-11111  | XXXXXXXX@XXXXXXX.XXX |   Registergericht: XXXXXX XXX SSSS Aufsichtsratsvorsitzende: XXXXXXXXX XXXX Geschäftsführer: XXXXX XXXXX; XXXX XXXXXXXXXXXX; XXXXXXXX XXXX    www.XXXXXXXXX.com   The information contained in this email and any attachments have been classified as limited access and/or privileged State Street information/communication and is intended solely for the use of the named addressee(s). If you are not an intended recipient or a person responsible for delivery to an intended recipient, please notify the author and destroy this email. Any unauthorized copying, disclosure, retention or distribution of the material in this email is strictly forbidden.                 Go green.
